title: Marry! My Black Horse - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Wealthy Characters
author: Shi Xiao Zha   师小札
description:
The novel tells story about how love grows in the arranged marriage. 

When Guan Xin Mu was rejected by Xia Yu, her long-term crush, Fei Jun which she called Shu Shu (叔叔) (uncle) comforted and accompanied her through her heartbroken days.

When Fei Jun’s dad was in critical health condition, his one wish was to see him married and had a happy life. Having no girlfriend at the moment, Fei Jun proposed to Guan Xin Mu to be his wife.

So then begin their marriage life, can their arranged marriage stand strong through problems that are waiting ahead? Can this marriage heal Guan Xin Mu’s broken heart? And make her fall in love once again?>
